mapper.update: update client_bill_income set client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opration_type = #{oprationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_amount = #{originAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation_amount = #{operationAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, final_amount = #{finalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper_user = #{operUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, client_id, opration_type, origin_amount, operation_amount, final_amount, operation_time, oper_user, desc from client_bill_income where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
